mapper.insert: insert into attach (uuid, uploadPath, filename, bno, userid, attachType, thumbnail) values(#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{bno}, #{userid}, #{attachType}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.select: select * from attach where bno = #{bno} and thumbnail = 1 order by bno desc;
select * from attach where thumbnail = 1 order by bno desc;
select * from attach where userid = #{userid} order by bno desc;
mapper.delete: delete from attach where userid = #{userid} and attachType = 1
mapper.select: select * from attach where uploadPath = curdate() - interval 1 day
